newsitem.title: UK: ABN AMRO hires Merrill research head.
newsitem.headline: ABN AMRO hires Merrill research head.

text.p: ABN AMRO Hoare Govett said on Monday it has appointed Andre Sharon as head of global research development.
Sharon was previously head of European equity research at Merrill Lynch International.
"We were very pleased to hire him," Nigel Hugh-Smith, ABN AMRO Hoare Govett's head of global research told Reuters.

"What we want to do is to develop our research product further," he said, adding that Sharon's experience in the European market and in the U.S. fund management industry would be "of invaluable assistance".
Hugh-Smith said ABN AMRO Hoare Govett had also hired John Whitehead from Merrill Lynch to take charge of research communication, the same role he had with his old firm.
Both men will be based in London. Sharon will report to Hugh-Smith and is likely to start on November 4, he added.
